H0.text: where does the brazos river start and stop. Lake Texoma

H1.text: where does the brazos river start and stop. Red River

H2.text: where does the brazos river start and stop. Matagorda Bay

H3.text: where does the brazos river start and stop. Gulf of Mexico

A4.text: The Brazos proper begins at the confluence of the Salt Fork and Double Mountain Fork.

A5.text: The Brazos River empties into the Gulf of Mexico in the marshes just south of Freeport.
